original_text:
The princes of Zoan have become fools,
    and the princes of Memphis are deluded;
those who are the cornerstones of her tribes
    have made Egypt stagger.
korean_text: 소안의 방백들은 어리석었고 놉의 방백들은 미혹되었도다 그들은 애굽 종족들의 모퉁잇돌이거늘 애굽을 그릇 가게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: The princes of Zoan have become fools
and the princes of Memphis are deluded
those who are the cornerstones of her tribes
